column5: Our Daytona trip got a wash out as our ticket booker wanted twice the asking price for the 50th running of the event. It was a major disappointment to both Betty and I,but I was not about to pay 1200 bucks to watch two races. Thanks to all that gave advice on our non trip. To also add,It seems myself and Betty will be GRANDPARENTS come September.
Its a shame you couldn't make it  for the races but congrats on being grand parents!!  kevin
Congratulations Gramps!! It sure does give a different perspective on life.
GRANDPARENTS.......don't that make you feel old...LOL
Yeah, I'm five times old Terry.  Congrats on the upcoming event Brian.......
